subject: Re: [sugar] eBook software
body:
Stephen Thorne wrote:> What I was thinking was possibly using the web browser and a local> light weight http server of some kind (SimpleHTTPServer or something)> that would serve ajaxy data to the web browser and integrate with> things like the journal. This way even if the Web activity with its> MozEmbed component dies via OOM, the backend store can still be> written (and the backend store can take SIGDANGER signals and cache> that data to disk).
This is exactly what's being worked on.
